name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in observability and telemetry, ensuring high-performance solutions are effectively monitored and optimized. I excel in collaboration and communication, facilitating cross-functional teamwork to drive project success. My strong problem-solving abilities enable me to tackle complex programming challenges efficiently, utilizing a multi-language approach. 
My technical expertise encompasses full-stack development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, alongside modern JavaScript/TypeScript and **Python**. I am proficient in cloud technologies including **Azure** and **AWS**, and have developed enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing.
I possess a robust foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, consistently building secure applications aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I bring hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
